TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompatibilityDataProtector extends System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector
Public NotInheritable Class CompatibilityDataProtector Inherits DataProtector

Docs.summary: A that can be used by ASP.NET 4.x to interact with ASP.NET Core's DataProtection stack. This type is for internal use only and shouldn't be directly used by developers.

Docs.summary: Invokes a delegate where calls to and will ignore the primary purpose and instead use only the sub-purposes.
